SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! CREATE PATH TO pmrep.cnx FILE : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_IPC_REPCNXFILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"pmrep_&$RUNID#.cnx")
! PMREP directory : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_PMREP_DIR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PMREP# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
! Environment file : IF &UC4RB_IPC_ENV_FILE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_IPC_ENV_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_ENV_FILE# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : ENDIF
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# ! setting environment variables and directory for windows :CASE "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_IPC_ENV_FILE# <> "" call &UC4RB_ENV_FILE# SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Unable to initialize Informatica execution environment." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS : ENDIF cd /d &UC4RB_PMREP# SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "INVALID DIRECTORY &UC4RB_PMREP#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@WINDOWS SET INFA_REPCNX_INFO=&UC4RB_IPC_REPCNXFILE#
! setting environment variables and directory for unix :CASE "UNIX" : IF &UC4RB_IPC_ENV_FILE# <> "" . &UC4RB_ENV_FILE# error=$? : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#="Unable to initialize Informatica execution environment." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX : ENDIF cd &UC4RB_PMREP# error=$? : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "INVALID DIRECTORY &UC4RB_PMREP#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_INFORMATICA_POWERCENTER.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMD_RETCODE@UNIX export INFA_REPCNX_INFO=&UC4RB_IPC_REPCNXFILE# :OTHER :ENDSWITCH

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include sets the environment variables and change the directory where the pmrep command will be executed.
